Title: We Will All Be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts
Writer: Lilly Wachowski (created by), Lana Wachowski (created by), J. Michael Straczynski (created by), Lilly Wachowski, Lana Wachowski, J. Michael Straczynski
Actors: Aml Ameen, Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai
Plot: Sun fights to adjust to her new life as Capheus tries to change his. Will and Nomi dig up disturbing information that could change everything.
